snippet: The nurse, Pauline Cafferkey, who was infected while working as a volunteer in Sierra Leone, “is showing signs of improvement,” the Royal Free Hospital said.
abstract: Royal Free Hospital in London says Pauline Cafferkey, nurse infected with Ebola virus in Sierra Leone in December 2014, has emerged from critical condition.
lead_paragraph: The nurse, Pauline Cafferkey, who was infected while working as a volunteer in Sierra Leone, “is showing signs of improvement,” the Royal Free Hospital said.

headline.main: British Nurse With Ebola Is Improving, Hospital Says
